TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHealthCheck

summary.span: 表示运行状况检查，可用于检查应用程序中组件的状态，例如后端服务、数据库或某些内部状态。

span.span: Represents a health check, which can be used to check the status of a component in the application, such as a backend service, database or some internal state.
